CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. FRANCISCO JIMENEZ RECIO AND ADRINA LOPEZ-MESA.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
